This homepage contains all materials used during the **Advanced `R` workshop** taught at the University of Michigan [EEB department](https://lsa.umich.edu/eeb). The workshops is organized by Katrina Munsterman, Alden Dirks and Max Hesselbarth. 

The introductory slides for each topic can be found under the "Slides" menu item as PDF files. For each topic there is an exercise and a corresponding solution , which can be found under the "Exercise" and "Solution" menu items.

In case you have any questions, please contact [mhessel\<at>umich.edu](mailto:mhessel@umich.edu), [kmunster@umich.edu\<at>umich.edu](mailto:kmunster@umich.edu@umich.edu), or [adirks\<at>umich.edu](mailto:adirks@umich.edu).

### Content

- Spatial data
- Using the _tidyverse_
- Data visualization using _ggplot2_

Please note that the Advanced `R` workshop project is released with a [Contributor Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html). By taking part, you agree to abide by its terms.
